title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.18 - Surcharge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4500.18 - Surcharge

State Regulations

Any regional off-track-betting corporation may suspend
surcharge of accounts pursuant to section 1012 of the Racing, Pari-Mutuel

Wagering and Breeding Law and consistent with such corporation's plan of
operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4500.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
